title: When the marksman role is higher in need than support

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

replies.body: No one wants to play ADC anymore because it is probably the hardest role due to positioning and people don't want to spend the time to learn it.  Plus, if you EVER fall behind in bot, you get flamed horribly.
Bad Tahms everywhere. Also, ADC has been gradually becoming a less and less wanted role for a while, now. Sometimes it actually takes us longer to find one than a support.

This should probably be in the "memes and games" board.

Also, post a reaction gif :D
This should not be in Gameplay and Balance. if you have something to say about this subject, say it, don't leave it for us to assume.
